topic.title: New Art
topic.description: Find documents which discuss Postmodern art.
topic.narrative: Relevant documents discuss contemporary art, art genres and artists. Documents that consider any specific genre belonging to Postmodernism in the fields of literature, music, fine arts, etc., are also relevant.

topic.title: Electoral Behaviour
topic.description: Find documents that discuss the behaviour of voters in national parliamentary or presidential elections.
topic.narrative: Relevant documents give reasons for voters' decisions in elections for the national parliament or for the president. A relevant document must explain why one or more voters have decided on a specific party or person.
